2083470.name: UTTER INVERSE
2083470.description:
NOTE: The engine used to develop UTTER INVERSE has changed, and any screenshots here are representative of the previous engine's version. A full update to this page is forthcoming.

-

Grip the SWORD and kill your way towards the arcane Dynast at the heart of her Demesne.

Supported by the Purities and antagonized by the Dynast's aides, May advances deeper towards the core. But, somewhere far away, another pair of hands once held RED LIGHT -

- and, somewhere even further, the thought machine begins to turn...



UTTER INVERSE is an esoteric dark fantasy sci-fi dungeon crawler, hand-made by a single developer. Live the fatal first hours of May's last night past the boundary.

Key Features:

  • ORIGINAL KILL - Vivid real-time menu-based combat, supplemented by the abilities of the SWORD.
  • HER DEMESNE - Become lost in a distorted realm drowned by suffusive darkness.
  • OVERFLOW AND QUALIA - Each action taken affects May's status and attributes directly, from saving the game to dying to consuming items.
  • THE FINAL MONSTER - Keep on killing until you can't feel anything but RED LIGHT.
  • AETIOLACUNA - This game is a love story.



-+-+- +++- + ---+ + --- +- -++ --- +-+- -- +-++- +--+- +++ +-++-

Even if I had the means to cut my hair
I’d not
for fear it couldn’t grow at all.

And though no thing in here exists to tangle it
besides my fingers,
I stay careful just in case.

Because I know not whether my hair has found the limit of its length
or if it was ever any shorter from the start.

- A I A

--+ ---- ++---++- + ---++---- +-+- +++ -++-++ + ---++- ++- ++- --
